remarks: Condition implying a 3-dim lattice volume.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2012.)
statement:
lvoli3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lvoli3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lvoli3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lvoli3.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lvoli3.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
lvoli3 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. P /\ Q e. A ) /\ -. Q .<_ X ) -> ( X .\/ Q ) e. V ) $.
